modifications.on: network proposed by Conneau et al.
modifications.aim of reducing: number of parameters , storage size and latency
modifications.from sentence: In this paper , we investigate modifications on the network proposed by Conneau et al. with the aim of reducing its number of parameters , storage size and latency with minimal performance degradation .

used.from sentence: To achieve these improvements we used Temporal Depthwise Separable Convolution and Global Average Pooling techniques .

Squeezed Very Deep Convolutional Neural.from sentence: Therefore , our main contribution is to propose the Squeezed Very Deep Convolutional Neural Networks ( SVDCNN ) , a text classification model which requires significantly fewer parameters compared to the stateof - the - art CNNs .
